data.text: @SenatorLankford GOP. WAKE.UP. THIS. MESS. IS. ON. YOU. Twice you failed us. The people are in the streets. The Dems impeached Trump 2 times. The UK Parliament investigates Epstein and Trump. UK fires ambassador over kompromat. Fire Trump. Fire Palantir. Fire Musk. We did not vote for this.
@SenatorLankford Your either part of the problem or the solution. You’re a big RINO problem.
